def_en: If you have a settled way of life, you stay in one place, in one job, or with one person, rather than moving around or changing.

def_cn: (情况、制度等)固定不变的，无变化的
def_en: A settled situation or system stays the same all the time.

def_cn: (因长期在某地生活或工作)舒适自在的，适应的,习惯的
def_en: If you feel settled, you have been living or working in a place long enough to feel comfortable there.
